channel.title: Portal Teles? (Delta Source) Help Please
channel.description:
So i got these portals with out them teleing and i want them to be able to tele to where i want them i got the cords i just dont know where to put then ... like where and what do i search
thanks

and i have no way of helping you on mine portals look like this //Portals case 7319: // memberportal if(playerIsMember == 1) teleportToX = 3117; teleportToY = 9842; sendMessage("you teleport to the members area."); if(playerIsMember == 0) sendMessage("you have to be a member to use this portal!"); break; case 2465: // trainportal teleportToX = 3051; teleportToY = 3493; sendMessage("you teleport to the training area."); break; case 2474: // pkportal teleportToX = 2862; teleportToY = 9772; sendMessage("you teleport to propk zone, Good Luck!"); sendMessage("This is team zone!"); sendMessage("To check your pk points type ::mypk!"); break; (found in my client.java)
